email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a shipment of 8500MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CFR terms. The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 150000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th October, and the initial freight quote is USD55 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Bennett
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD50 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
James Carter
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD52 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th October. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Bennett
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD52 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
James Carter
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on 1st October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Bennett
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
James Carter
Global Chartering
